name: referrer-plugin
description: Automatically attach detailed referrer details to the event

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && esbuild src/plugin.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node10.4 --outfile=dist/index.js && mkdir dist/data && wget https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/snowplow-hosted-assets/third-party/referer-parser/referers-latest.yaml -O dist/data/referers.yml && wget https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/snowplow-hosted-assets/third-party/referer-parser/referers-latest.json -O dist/data/referers.json

author: wbchn
